en: Verify client unique identity
synonyms: biometrics; client registry

en: Enrol client for health services/clinical care plan
synonyms: register client/patient for health services

en: Longitudinal tracking of client’s health status and services
synonyms: domain-specific registers; eRegistries; eRegister; digital register; digital service record; immunization registry; digitized registers for longitudinal health program; including tracking of migrant populations’ benefits and health status; case management logs within specific target populations, including migrant populations

en: Manage client's structured clinical records
synonyms: clinical record of an individual with information that spans across multiple clinical domains; electronic medical record; personal health record

en: Manage client’s unstructured clinical records
synonyms: electronic medical record and personal health records with that are not based on structured data, and instead including notes, images, documents

en: Routine health indicator data collection and management
synonyms: data collection for Health Management Information System (HMIS); client health data collection

en: Provide prompts and alerts based according to protocol
synonyms: clinical decision support, job aid--linked to clients digital health record; provision of alerts for abnormal findings/lab values, “IF THEN statements” ;process algorithms to support service delivery according to care plans, guidelines, and protocols

en: Provide checklist according to protocol
synonyms: job aid and assessment tools to support service delivery—may or may not be linked to a digital health record; decision trees to support service delivery according to care plans, guidelines, and protocols

en: Screen clients by risk or other health status
synonyms: tools for screening, risk assessment, triage and client prioritization; job aid to support service delivery according to care plans, guidelines, and protocols

en: Consultations between remote client and healthcare provider
synonyms: remote consultation; tele consultation; client based telemedicine; hotlines; call centers; helpline; real-time telemedicine; interactive telemedicine; synchronous telemedicine; client calls a health worker or hotline to receive clinical guidance on health issue

en: Remote monitoring of client health or diagnostic data by provider
synonyms: telemonitoring; virtual monitoring; provider is able to monitor client’s health through an implanted sensor/diagnostic equipment

en: Transmission of medical data to healthcare provider
synonyms: store and forward; asynchronous telemedicine

en: Consultations for case management between healthcare providers
synonyms: inter-provider communication; closed usergroup; health worker to health worker communication; consulting other health care providers, particularly specialists, for patient case management; seeking second opinion for patient case management

en: Communication from healthcare provider(s) to supervisor
Communication and performance feedback to healthcare provider(s)
synonyms: supportive supervision; coaching/mentoring; audit and feedback; communication to healthcare provider based on their performance

en: Transmit routine news and workflow notifications to healthcare provider(s)
synonyms: alerts and reminders to healthcare provider; motivational communication healthcare provider; transmission of workflow updates to healthcare provider

en: Transmit non-routine health event alerts to healthcare providers
synonyms: public health related updates to health workers; emergency alerts to healthcare providers; mass messaging to healthcare providers

en: Peer group for healthcare providers
synonyms: peer support; peer learning; closed user groups; communication mechanisms for healthcare providers to discuss among themselves

en: Coordinate emergency response and transport
synonyms: ambulance systems; emergency response management; care coordination

en: Manage referrals between points of service within health sector
synonyms: clinical task linking;referral management

en: Manage referrals between health and other sectors
synonyms: intersectoral referral management

en: Identify client(s) in need of services
synonyms: automated scheduling of client’s health appointments

en: Schedule healthcare provider's activities
synonyms: work planning;prioritization of daily activities/tasks;task management

en: Provide training content to healthcare provider(s)
synonyms: mLearning;eLearning;virtual learning;educational videos, multimedia learning and access to clinical guidance;training reinforcement and refreshers

en: Assess capacity of healthcare provider
synonyms: quizzes and and interactive exercises to assess knowledge and competence

en: Transmit or track prescription orders
synonyms: tracking medication orders;tools to place prescription orders or track the status of prescriptions and refills

en: Track client's medication consumption
synonyms: monitoring adherence to medications and drugs;monitoring/observing whether patients have taken their prescribed medications

en: Report effects adverse drug
synonyms: reporting contraindications, drug interactions, adverse effects

en: Transmit to healthcare provider and track
synonyms: laboratory results management;tests results communication between healthcare providers

en: Transmit diagnostic orders diagnostic results
synonyms: laboratory test requisition and management

en: Capture from digital devices
synonyms: point of care diagnostics;diagnostic accessories added to digital devices

en: Track biological specimens
synonyms: tracking of blood donations
